subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Brewers (10-2) are off to their best start since going 13-0 to start the 1987 season. It is Milwaukee’s longest winning streak since a nine-game string last April.
snippet: The Brewers (10-2) are off to their best start since going 13-0 to start the 1987 season. It is Milwaukee’s longest winning streak since a nine-game string last April.
